DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect L-citrulline metformin combination therapy muscle function force patient Becker muscular dystrophy ( BMD ) .
DOC.detailed_description: This single center , not-randomized open study . The study medication consist L-citrulline metformin administer orally ; 5g citrulline 500mg metformin tablet give 3 time daily . Half patient treat metformin first 6 week study . The patient receive initially L-citrulline 6 week , patient treat combination therapy ( metformin L-citrulline ) another 6 week period . The study last 12 week include screen visit 3 visit baseline , week 6 week 12 .
